description: The application seeks planning permission for a single storey side/rear (wrap around) extension, following demolition of existing rear conservatory; part roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope with the creation of roof terrace enclosed with metal balustrade; additional alterations to rear elevation involving removal of Juliet balcony from existing rear roof extension and replaced with two windows; alteration to first floor side elevation involving alteration to rear and side windows; demolition of existing outbuilding; and the installation of air conditioning unit to the side passage.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): Location Plan (ref. #00563777-5409FF); Proposed Ground & First Floor Plan (ref. 01-002 Rev C); Proposed Second Floor & Roof Plans (ref. 01-003 Rev E); Proposed Sections AA- & BB (ref. 01-004 Rev E); and Proposed Elevations (ref. 01-005 Rev E)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021)  and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).	 | The proposed side window on the western elevation of the first-floor outrigger shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3, D4 of the London Plan (2021), policies Local variation to policy 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).	 | The rating noise level emitted by the air conditioning unit, as assessed under BS4142:2014, shall not exceed the existing background sound level, as measured at the nearest sensitive fa√ßades, during the relevant periods of operation.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7A, Local Variation 7.4 and 7Bpolicies 1.1(g), 2.1(c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021)

| Prior to use, machinery, plant or equipment/ extraction/ ventilation system and ducting at the development shall be mounted with proprietary anti-vibration isolators and fan motors shall be vibration isolated from the casing and adequately silenced and maintained as such.

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site and surrounding premises is not adversely affected by vibration in accordance with policies D14 of the London Plan (2021); 1.1(j) of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012); and 3.5 and 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
